諿字的基本解释

諿
xǔ
智谋：“女不女，其心予，覆夫諿。”

諿字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xǔ］
智谋。

諿字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　諿； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1173第05
【廣韻】【集韻】【正韻】?七入切，音緝。和也，辯也。　又人名。唐諿，見【唐書·宰相表】。　又【字彙】私呂切，音醑。謀也。【揚子·太?經】戾次七：女不女，其心予，覆夫諿。【註】謀也。【釋文】才智之稱也。　【㴑原】本作咠。

考證：〔【揚子·太?經】次七：女不女，其心予覆夫諿。〕　謹按此戾首之次七也，戾字不可省，今照原文次七上增戾字。
諿字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
諿字的起名意思

智谋。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　諿; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 1173 05
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Positive Rhyme]? Seven cuts, sound arrest. He also argues.　Another name. Tang Yu, see 【Book of Tang·List of Prime Ministers】.　 Also 【Words】Private Lu cut, sound 醑. Plot too. 【Yangtze·Tai? Classic】Juci Seven: If a woman is not a woman, her heart will give her husband and her husband will be rich. 【Note】Mou also. 【Explanation】It is also called talent.　【㴑原】This is a 咠. Textual research: [[Yangtze·Tai? Jing] Second Seven: If a woman is a woman or not, her heart is given to her husband. 〔〕 　 I would like to press this to be the second to the first seven. The character cannot be spared. According to the original text, the second seven is added to the character.
